name: Zignuts Technolab
tagline: Expert remote developers & product team on demand
description:
At Zignuts Technolab, we help Startups to turn their ideas into reality and Enterprises to stay innovative and competitive in cost-effective way. Whether you're a big Agency or a Startup in stealth mode - we give our clients the creative, technical and business talent they need to succeed.
We strive to excel in the invention and development of the industry’s most advanced technical solutions including Mobile Apps, Web Solution, eCommerce, Digital Transformation, Blockchain, IoT & Smart Solution, Wearable Apps, Cloud Integration, Cross-platform Apps, On-demand Services, Enterprise Mobility and alike. We translate these technologies into value for our clients’ customers giving them professional and best-in-class services.
Our technological stack includes but not limited to, Android, Java, iOS, Swift, Javascript, VueJS, Angular.JS, React.JS, jQuery, PHP, HTML5/CSS3, Wordpress, Laravel, WooCommerce, CodeIgniter, UX/UI, Responsive Design, Bootstrap, Material UI, React Native, REST Api, Amazon AWS, Google Cloud, Firebase etc.
READ MORE...
